snippet.title: [Maimaimaigoen] Game Episode 1, Part 1 (English Subs)
snippet.description:
Translations by Ganbarebenji and Anonymous Piyo ( https://twitter.com/artwaltzed )
Turn on English subtitles by clicking the CC icon at the bottom of the video. 

Sorry if the timing for the dialogue is too quick! I'll be slowing down for the next videos to give everyone more time to read. 

The responses you select can increase your friendship with the kids. The responses in this video are the "correct" ones that increase their friendship. Check out this video for the dialogue for the other selections: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yntm_a_Dcmk 

Thanks for watching, demi! 

--

Episode 1 - Welcome to Uropia

One day, the children and Okada Yu go on a field trip to Sanrio Puroland and find themselves lost in a deserted amusement park called "Uropia." They're bewildered by the unfamiliar surroundings when a mysterious creature Froggy Egg, appears before them. Suddenly, they're given an explanation of a "game"...

Okada and the children begin challenging various attractions within the park to beat the game and return to their original world. However, they're confronted with trials one after another...

--

About Maimaimaigoen

Maimaimaigoen is a multidimensional story about the "growing pains of the heart" of 16 children and their nursery school teachers. It examines each person as an individual and accompanies them through the difficulties of living in today's world.


Introduction

Okada Yu, a new nursery school teacher, is on a field trip to Sanrio Puroland with his students.  As they're about to head home after a fun day, his vision suddenly distorted... They wander into the mysterious amusement park Uropia where they're confronted by a strange yet oddly cute creature called "Froggy Egg." To escape from Uropia, he and the children must challenge the park's attractions and collect 10 medals...

--

Official Website: https://www.gamemaga.jp/maimaimaigoen/
Official X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/maigoen_sanrio
Unofficial English Wiki: https://maimaimaigoen.fandom.com/wiki/Maimaimaigoen_Wiki
Unofficial English Wiki X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/maigoenwiki
Unofficial English Wiki Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/maigoenwiki.bsky.social
Ganbarebenji's Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/ganbarebenji
Anonymous Piyo's Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/artwaltzed
